mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WEB_FILE(SEQ, GROUP_SEQ, FILE_NAME, FILE_ORIG_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_TYPE, FILE_SIZE, REG_ID, REG_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE, ORDER_NO) VALUES ( WEB_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{groupSeq}, #{fileName}, #{fileOrigName}, #{filePath}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, '사용자', SYSDATE, '사용자', SYSDATE, '') )
